headline: Ask HN: Donate to HelpingToLeave (if you can)
description:
This is obviously off-topic and I'm not sure how it will affect my HM karma, but I wanted to try and reach out to (wonderful) HN community anyway.

The war continues, and one of the easiest way for anyone around the world to support Ukraine is to donate to organizations helping citizens of war zones escape.

The one I personally trust is HelpingToLeave [0] - they recently published a post saying they're almost out of money [1]. I suspect that after some time, the flow of donations naturally slows down. So I'm here to do what I can to keep the donations flowing.

Their website has links to donate and view reports. Let me also share couple of videos with people behind the project [2] (sorry it is in Russian and the auto-subtitles are not 100% perfect).

(As they often say, any amount matters. The average cost of one evacuation is €100).

[0]: https://helpingtoleave.org/en

[1]: https://www.facebook.com/helpingtoleave/posts/pfbid02v4D9KZwnAakpPaex3scN3MnBkGXSUXAcBhoGSQJriUze8F3c57WfbyVwneQWPSaAl

[2]: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ii93K6QwfNA

[3]: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mgv92h0QPzM
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 捐赠给HelpingToLeave（如果你可以的话）。
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 捐贈給HelpingToLeave（如果你可以的話）。
description_zh-Hans:
这显然是偏离主题的，我不知道它会如何影响我的HM业力，但无论如何，我想尝试联系（美妙的）HN社区。

战争仍在继续，世界各地的人支持乌克兰的最简单方法之一是向帮助战区公民逃生的组织捐款。

我个人信任的是HelpingToLeave [0] - 他们最近发表的帖子说他们几乎没有钱了[1]。我猜想，经过一段时间后，捐款的流量自然会减慢。所以我在这里尽我所能保持捐款的流动。

他们的网站有捐款和查看报告的链接。让我也和大家分享一下这个项目背后的人的几个视频[2]（对不起，这是俄语，自动字幕不是100%完美）。

（正如他们经常说的，任何金额都很重要。一次疏散的平均费用为100欧元）。

[0]: https://helpingtoleave.org/en

[1]: https://www.facebook.com/helpingtoleave/posts/pfbid02v4D9KZwnAakpPaex3scN3MnBkGXSUXAcBhoGSQJriUze8F3c57WfbyVwneQWPSaAl

[2]: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ii93K6QwfNA
